name: @lucyus/actionify
description: Actionify is a lightweight Node.js automation library for Windows, enabling seamless control of the mouse, keyboard, clipboard, screen, windows and sound, with additional features like OCR and more.

scripts.build: npm run clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp rebuild && tsc -p . && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && node-gyp configure --release && node-gyp rebuild --release && tsc -p . --sourceMap false --declarationMap false && npm run copy:assets
scripts.deploy: npm run build:prod && npm publish --access public
scripts.execute: node -e "const { spawn } = require('child_process'); spawn('node', [process.argv[1].replace('src', 'lib').replace('.ts', '.js')], { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true });"
scripts.build:execute: npm run build && npm run execute
scripts.fastbuild:execute: tsc -p . && npm run copy:assets && npm run execute

author: Lucyus
